mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_no, q.userid, u.usernick, q.head_title, -- 테이블 별칭 추가 q.qna_title, q.qna_content, DATE_FORMAT(q.qna_writedate, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS qna_writedate, q.qna_state, q.qna_answer, q.answer_user, q.qna_answer_date, q.active_state, -- 테이블 별칭 추가 (qna_tbl의 active_state를 사용) q.privacyQ, q.qna_pwd, i.image_url as qna_img FROM qna_tbl q JOIN user_tbl u ON q.userid = u.userid LEFT JOIN image_tbl i ON q.qna_img = i.image_no WHERE q.qna_no = #{qna_no};

select count(qna_no) from qna_tbl where
${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%' and
active_state IN (1, 2)
mapper.insert: insert into qna_tbl (userid, head_title, qna_title, qna_content, qna_state, qna_writedate, privacyQ, active_state, qna_pwd, qna_img) values (#{userid}, #{head_title}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_state}, NOW(), #{privacyQ}, #{active_state}, #{qna_pwd}, #{qna_img})
mapper.select: select qna_no, head_title, qna_title,qna_content,qna_state,privacyQ,qna_pwd from qna_tbl where qna_no=#{qna_no}
mapper.update: update qna_tbl set qna_title=#{qna_title}, qna_content=#{qna_content}, head_title=#{head_title}, privacyQ=#{privacyQ}, active_state=#{active_state}, qna_pwd=#{qna_pwd} where qna_no=#{qna_no} and userid=#{userid}
update qna_tbl set active_state=0 where qna_no=#{qna_no} and userid=#{userid}
